H3.text: when did the us not go to the olympics. 1980

A4.text: Led by the United States, 66 countries boycotted the games entirely, because of the Soviet–Afghan War.

A5.text: The 1980 Summer Olympics were disrupted by another, even larger, boycott led by the United States in protest of the 1979 Soviet–Afghan War.
